description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Become a blackjack master on an intergalactic adventure! Learn optimal strategy with the humorous Captain Bronzebeard by your side. So, batten down the hatches and set sail for success!
description.short: Become a blackjack master on an intergalactic adventure! Learn optimal strategy with the humorous Captain Bronzebeard by your side. So, batten down the hatches and set sail for success!
